name: Binky Griptite
description: '''Franklin Stribling''', professionally known as '''Binky Griptite''', is an American guitarist, [[record producer]], and [[Disc jockey|radio DJ]]. He is best known as a founding member and guitarist of [[Sharon Jones & the Dap-Kings]], Soul Providers, and [[Antibalas]], among other [[Daptone Records]]-related projects. From 2017 to 2021, he hosted the weekly radio program ''The Boogie Down'' on [[WFUV]].
